title: Ep. 413: Finding Beauty Around the World with Jo Franco
itunes:title: Ep. 413: Finding Beauty Around the World with Jo Franco
description:
Jo Franco, co-host of World’s Most Amazing Rental Properties, on Netflix, and host of the podcast Not Your Average Jo, is here to talk about how travel intersects with beauty, share stories from her travels, and give us all her tips for packing well and experiencing new cultures to the fullest. Plus, we talk about sunscreens, insect repellants, and which hair tools and styling products make travel easier (especially if you have curly hair!).

  • Shop the products mentioned on Ep. 413: shopmyshelf.us/collections/55049
  • Episode recap, links, and sponsor promo codes: fatmascara.com/blog
  • Private Facebook Group: Fat Mascara Raising a Wand
  • Social media: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jenn_edit
  • Submit a "Raise A Wand" product recommendation and be featured on the show: email info@fatmascara.com or leave a voicemail at 646-481-8182

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
